Abstract: This review explores recent advancements in understanding valvular heart disease pathophysiology and novel therapeutic approaches. We discuss emerging concepts in rheumatic heart disease, aortic stenosis, mitral regurgitation, mitral stenosis, tricuspid regurgitation, and bicuspid aortic valve disease. The article highlights innovative diagnostic techniques, minimally invasive interventions, and personalized treatment strategies that are reshaping the management of these conditions, offering improved outcomes and quality of life for patients with valvular heart disease.
